Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard/Hillborough Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillborough Way and Avatar Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: This rather buys intersection near the center of town has a number of useful shops and facilities on each corner. To the southeast is Altihmin's Academy of Advanced Fighting Techniques. On the northeast is the Oceancrest Caretaking Facility and on the northwest is Danielle's Mystic Mage's Emporium. Finally, on the southwest is the Shrine of Life and Death, a very symbolic icon to all clerical persons.
